     publish_time_iso : str
         Scheduled publish time in ISO-8601.
     text : str
         Post content.

     Returns
     -------
     dict

     Publish a short social update.

     ----------
     user : str
         Username or ID.
     text : str
         Message body (max ~280 chars).

     -------
     dict
         {
             "post_id" : <str>,
             "posted_at": <str>
         }

     Required Parameters: 'user' (string), 'text' (string)

     Fetch recent posts for a user.

     Parameters
     ----------

     limit : int, optional
